titleStmt.title: The progno[stication] made for the yeare of [--] God, now present 1576. [-] the astrologicall iudgement of [-]ters of the yeare, and the cl[-] weather. &c. Written chie[fly for the] meridian of the ci[ty] of Chester. / By Alexander Mouns[lowe].
titleStmt.author: Mounslowe, Alexander.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted in Pow[les church] yarde, by Richarde W[atkins and J. Roberts],

notesStmt.note: This was apparently calculated for Chester.
Imperfect: fragments of eight leaves, including title page, in unfolded sheets, used as endpapers of a copy of Virgil: Bucolica et Georgica, Frankfort, 1589 (NLS shelfmark: K.49.f).
Author's name taken from verso of final leaf: By yours so [sic] commaunde, Alexander Mounslowe.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
